result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bradley L. Marvin

records.addlTxt:
Clerk: Heather.
Case Called: 3:12 p.m. 
State appears by ADA Alex Lech in person. Defendant FAILS to appear, with Atty Peter Vu.
VRCW.

COURT indicates Defendant did not show at last hearing and COURT gave Deft opportunity to show up to Court today.
Atty Vu does not know where his client is. 
ADA Lech requests BW.
COURT GRANTS BW $500.00.

Adjourned: 3:14 p.m.

10/19/22 Notice of Hearing
Bradley Marvin
1431 S 29th Ave #E
Wisconsin Rapids, WI 54494
RETURN TO SENDER; NOT DELIVERABLE AS ADDRESSED; UNABLE TO FORWARD
Plea hearing on October 19, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

Clerk: Heather.
Case Called: 4:10 p.m. 
State appears by ADA Alex Lech in person. Defendant FAILS to appear, with Atty Peter Vu.
VRCW.

Atty Vu notes he did speak with his client earlier and expected him here.
COURT declines to issue a warrant and resets the plea hearing.

DATES:
PLEAH: 10/19/22 @ 3:00 p.m. 

Adjourned: 4:14 p.m.
Request for Video Appearance
Waiver of Right to Personal Appearance
Plea hearing on September 13, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

Clerk: Heather.
Case Called: 2:03 p.m. 
State appears by ADA Alex Lech in person. Defendant fails to appear, with Atty Jack Mathie appearing in person for Atty Peter Vu.
Date and time set for a plea hearing.
VRCW. 

Atty Lech is requesting to reset the plea hearing.
Atty Mathie notes he is covering for Atty Vu, and Deft has been in contact with counsel, requests hearing to be reset.

DATES;
PLEAH: 9/13/22 @ 4:00 p.m. 

Adjourned: 2:06 p.m.
Plea hearing on August 2, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Request for adjournment of 06/23/22 Final PreTrial
Final pre-trial on June 23, 2022 at 10:50 am.
ADA Lech appears; Atty Peter Vu appears via phone; FPT / TPD date set;
